document_data.name: Ulvira Snowveins
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ulvira Snowveins''' was an elderly [[half-elf]] in [[Skullport]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

''Circa'' [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} Ulvira ran the [[Feathered Rat]] pet shop on the Lower Level and was a spy for the [[Harpers]].

She used to be an [[adventurer]], but settled down with adventurer partner [[Salmarin Bearfriend]] and held the shop together around [[1369 DR]]. They also had two loyal [[blink dog]]s called Yuff and Yapp.Â <ref>
